name: TinyWatermark

content.description: Watermark text content, which is lower than image
content.description_zh: 水印文字内容，此属性低于 image

:height.description: The height of the watermark, the minimum height is 64px
:height.description_zh: 水印的高度, 最小高度64px

image.description: Image source, it is recommended to export 2x or 3x images, with high priority (base64 format is supported), this attribute is higher than content
image.description_zh: 图片源，建议导出 2 倍或 3 倍图，优先级高（支持 base64 格式），此属性高于 content

offset.description: The offset of the watermark from the top left corner of the container
offset.description_zh: 水印距离容器左上角的偏移量

:rotate.description: When the watermark is drawn, the angle of rotation in °
:rotate.description_zh: 水印绘制时，旋转的角度，单位 °

:width.description: The width of the watermark, the minimum width is 120px
:width.description_zh: 水印的宽度, 最小宽度120px

typeDetail.Font:
type Font = { 
        color:string,
        fontSize:number,
        fontWeight:string,
        fontFamily:string,
        fontStyle:string
       }

description: 给页面的某个区域加上水印。
description_zh: 给页面的某个区域加上水印。
